scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter frontend type-check && pnpm --filter backend type-check
scripts.prepare: node -e "if (process.env.HUSKY === '0' || process.env.CI) process.exit(0); try { require('husky') } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }"

lint-staged.**/*.{ts,tsx}: echo 'Type checking will be done during build...'
